TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusBarPanel extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class StatusBarPanel Inherits Component Implements ISupportInitialize
type StatusBarPanel = class inherit Component interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 代表 控制項中的面板。

span.span: Represents a panel in a control.

summary.span: 雖然 控制項會在前幾個版本的 控制項中取代並新增功能，您還是可以選擇保留 以提供回溯相容性 (Backward Compatibility) 或供未來使用。

span.span: Although the control replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A代表一個獨立的面板中的控制項。A represents an individual panel in the of a control. A可以包含文字及/或可用於反映的應用程式狀態的圖示。A can contain text and/or an icon that can be used to reflect the status of an application. 使用，可透過存取屬性控制，可擷取、 加入或移除個別。Use the , accessible through the property of a control, to retrieve, add, or remove an individual . 提供屬性，讓您修改內的面板的顯示行為控制項。The provides properties that enable you to modify the display behavior of a panel within a control. 您可以使用屬性來顯示面板中的圖示。You can use the property to display an icon within a panel. 這個屬性可以用於提供狀態的應用程式中的圖形表示法。This property can be used to provide a graphical representation of state in an application. 屬性可讓您指定文字及/或圖示面板中的對齊方式。The property enables you to specify how text and/or an icon is aligned within the panel. 若要確保您的面板正確大小以配合面板的文字，您可以使用空間內的屬性，以自動調整大小以配合面板的文字或以填滿剩餘的面板控制項。To ensure that your panel is sized properly to fit the text of the panel, you can use the property to automatically resize the panel to fit the text of the panel or to fill the remaining space within the control. 屬性可讓您指定的最小寬度，以確保，它不會取得小於資料可用於顯示面板。The property enables you to specify a minimum width for the panel to ensure that it does not get smaller than the data it is intended to display. 控制項通常用來顯示說明資訊或應用程式的相關狀態資訊。The control is typically used to display Help information or state information about your application. 通常，務必在面板中顯示呈現資料的其他資訊。Often, it is important to display additional information about data that is presented in a panel. 您可以使用每當滑鼠指標停留在面板上顯示資訊的屬性。You can use the property to display information whenever the mouse pointer rests on a panel. 雖然控制項通常用來顯示文字的資訊，您也可以提供您自己的顯示器類型。Although the control is typically used to display textual information, you can also provide your own type of display to a . 屬性可讓您指定如何會繪製。The property enables you to specify how the will be drawn. 根據預設，屬性用來顯示值屬性 (與圖示，如果在指定屬性)。By default, the property is used to display the value of the property (and an icon, if specified in the property). 如果屬性設定為，您可以面板內繪製您自己的資訊。If the property is set to , you can draw your own information into the panel. 繪製面板中的進度列或動畫的圖示，您可以使用這項功能。You can use this feature to draw a progress bar or an animated icon in the panel. 當您建立的執行個體類別，讀取/寫入屬性會設為初始值。When you create an instance of the class, the read/write properties are set to initial values. 如需這些值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立表單的控制項並加入兩個物件。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一個具名`panel1`，會顯示應用程式的狀態文字。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二個具名`panel2`、 顯示目前的日期，並使用屬性類別，以顯示目前的時間。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 此範例會使用屬性，以確保面板會顯示而不是標準的面板，，而且它會使用屬性來存取方法若要將面板加入。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此範例也會使用， ， ，和屬性，以初始化物件。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 這個範例假設在範例中定義的方法是定義和呼叫的建構函式從。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立的執行個體，下列的讀取/寫入屬性會設為初始值。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are set to initial values. |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||| ||| ||| ||`null`| ||1010| ||| ||零長度字串。A zero-length string.| ||零長度字串。A zero-length string.| ||100100| 您可以變更這些屬性，透過呼叫另一個屬性的值。You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立表單的控制項並加入兩個物件。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一個具名`panel1`，會顯示應用程式的狀態文字。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二個具名`panel2`、 顯示目前的日期，並使用屬性類別，以顯示目前的時間。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 此範例會使用屬性，以確保面板會顯示而不是標準的面板，，而且它會使用屬性來存取方法若要將面板加入。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此範例也會使用， ， ，和屬性，以初始化物件。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 這個範例假設在範例中定義的方法是定義和呼叫的建構函式從。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定狀態列面板內文字與圖示的對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of text and icons within the status bar panel.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性以水平對齊文字及/或圖示指派給內的面板框線的屬性。You can use this property to horizontally align the text and/or icon assigned to the property within the borders of the panel. 文字和圖示可對齊 left、 right 或置。Text and icons can be aligned to the left, right, or center of the . 沒有任何方法可以獨立定位內圖示。There is no way to independently position an icon within the . 例如，您無法定位圖示的左半部以時對齊右邊顯示的文字。For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the while aligning the text on the right side. 圖示永遠位於左邊不論文字的對齊方式的文字。The icon is always positioned to the left side of the text regardless of how the text is aligned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ， ， ，和屬性，以及如何處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and properties, and how to handle the event. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼到表單上。To run the example, paste the following code into a form. 呼叫`InitializeStatusBarPanels`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the status bar panel is automatically resized.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件設為優先於設定為這些面板值。 objects set to have precedence over those panels set to the value. 例如，具有其屬性設定為會縮短如果與屬性設定為需要該空間。For example, a that has its property set to is shortened if a with the property set to requires that space. 您可以使用的內容時，確保正確顯示在控制項，其中包含一個以上的面板。You can use to ensure that the contents of a are properly displayed in a control that contains more than one panel. 例如，您可以包含文字的顯示的文字自動調整面板 ()，而另一個面板描繪進度列必須是固定的大小可顯示 ().For example, you might want a panel that contains text to adjust automatically to the amount of text it is displaying (), while another panel on the that displays an owner-drawn progress bar would need to be a fixed size (). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立表單的控制項並加入兩個物件。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一個具名`panel1`，會顯示應用程式的狀態文字。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二個具名`panel2`、 顯示目前的日期，並使用屬性類別，以顯示目前的時間。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 此範例會使用屬性，以確保面板會顯示而不是標準的面板，，而且它會使用屬性來存取方法若要將面板加入。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此範例也會使用， ， ，和屬性，以初始化物件。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 這個範例假設在範例中定義的方法是定義和呼叫的建構函式從。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [清理 Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 上和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 取得或設定要在狀態列面板內顯示的圖示。

span.span: Gets or sets the icon to display within the status bar panel.

value.span: 表示要顯示在面板中的圖示。

span.span: An that represents the icon to display in the panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性顯示圖示，表示您的應用程式或您的應用程式中的處理序的狀態。You can use this property to display an icon that represents the state of your application or a process within your application. 例如，您可以在此顯示中的圖示，指出是否正在進行中或已完成儲存作業的檔案。For example, you can display an icon in a to indicate whether a file save operation is in progress or complete. > [!NOTE] > 沒有任何方法可以獨立定位內圖示。There is no way to independently position an icon within the . 例如，您無法定位圖示的左半部以時對齊的文字右側，即使用屬性。For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the while aligning the text on the right side using the property. 圖示永遠位於左側面板的文字，不論文字的對齊方式。The icon is always positioned to the left side of the panel's text regardless of how the text is aligned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性表示是否顯示文字，或是否為描繪管理面板。You can use this property to indicate whether a displays text or whether the panel is managed as an owner-drawn . 若要判斷需要繪製、 建立事件處理常式事件控制項。To determine when a needs to be drawn, create an event handler for the event of the control. 做為參數傳遞至事件處理常式事件可讓您判斷需要繪製的面板。The passed as a parameter to an event handler of the event enables you to determine which panel needs to be drawn. 也提供物件上執行繪圖的工作，您可以使用。The also provides a object you can use to perform drawing tasks on the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，委派，類別列舉型別和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, delegate, class, enumeration, and property. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼到表單上。To run the example, paste the following code into a form. 呼叫`InitializeStatusBarPanels`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Text : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定狀態列面板的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the status bar panel.
The text displayed in the panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性表示的文字會顯示當屬性設定為。This property represents the text that is displayed when the property is set to . 您可以使用這個屬性，以顯示應用程式中的相關資訊控制項。You can use this property to display information about your application in a control. 例如，您可以使用屬性時，使用者將滑鼠移至上方功能表顯示說明資訊或顯示名稱和應用程式中開啟檔案的位置。For example, you can use the property to display Help information when the user moves the mouse over a menu or to display the name and location of a file that is opened in an application. 若要將文字對齊文字方塊內，使用屬性。To align the text within a , use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立表單的控制項並加入兩個物件。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一個具名`panel1`，會顯示應用程式的狀態文字。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二個具名`panel2`、 顯示目前的日期，並使用屬性類別，以顯示目前的時間。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 此範例會使用屬性，以確保面板會顯示而不是標準的面板，，而且它會使用屬性來存取方法若要將面板加入。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此範例也會使用， ， ，和屬性，以初始化物件。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 這個範例假設在範例中定義的方法是定義和呼叫的建構函式從。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定與狀態列面板相關的工具提示文字。

span.span: Gets or sets ToolTip text associated with the status bar panel.
The ToolTip text for the panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性，以顯示其他資訊工具提示中，當滑鼠指標停在。You can use this property to display additional information in a ToolTip when the mouse pointer rests on a . 例如，您可以在其中顯示工具提示提供的資料傳輸速度顯示的檔案傳輸狀態。For example, you can display a ToolTip that provides data transfer speed for a that displays the status of a file transfer. 若要顯示工具提示為應用程式中其他控制項，請使用控制項。To display ToolTips for other controls in your application, use the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立表單的控制項並加入兩個物件。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 第一個具名`panel1`，會顯示應用程式的狀態文字。The first , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二個具名`panel2`、 顯示目前的日期，並使用屬性類別，以顯示目前的時間。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 此範例會使用屬性，以確保面板會顯示而不是標準的面板，，而且它會使用屬性來存取方法若要將面板加入。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此範例也會使用， ， ，和屬性，以初始化物件。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 這個範例假設在範例中定義的方法是定義和呼叫的建構函式從。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項內、狀態列面板的寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the status bar panel within the control.
The width, in pixels, of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性永遠會反映的實際寬度並不能小於屬性。The property always reflects the actual width of a and cannot be smaller than the property. 自動調整大小的寬度內容，您可以使用屬性。To automatically resize the width of the to the contents of the , you can use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ， ， ，和屬性，以及如何處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and properties, and how to handle the event. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼到表單上。To run the example, paste the following code into a form. 呼叫`InitializeStatusBarPanels`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的寬度小於 屬性的數值。

span.span: The width specified is less than the value of the property.
